name: Junior Juggler
description:
Keep the ball up with your juggling skills and challenge the global high score!

Make sure to time your juggle and collect item to add additional time to boost your score.

Features:
- Realistic juggling and ball physics
- Intense game play with time limit
- Gorgeous and realistic 3D environment
- Challenge the high scores in global leaderboard
- Get new ball abilities by unlocking achievements
